item.title: Create Unity Skyboxes From 360째 Images
item.description:
Today I want to show you how to use a 360째 panorama picture as a skybox for Unity. As you may know, skyboxes are usually created from 6 images (cubemaps), with each image representing one of the sides. However, 360째 photos usually use a so-called “Equirectangular” format, which looks something like this:
So in order to be able to use such an image in Unity, the idea of creating a cubemap from a 360째 photo is obvious.
